field.name: isregister
field.label: Allow only registered user to see the cart
field.description: Set yes to allow only registered users to see the cart

field.name: usesecure
field.label: Encrypt Login Form
field.description: Submit encrypted login data (requires SSL)

field.name: show_addtocart
field.label: Disable add to cart button totally?
field.description: Set this to yes for totally disabling the cart

field.name: cartbutton
field.label: Add to cart button type
field.description: Set an image or a button for the cart

field.name: show_thumb_cart
field.label: Show thumbnail images in the cart
field.description: Enable this to show thumb images

field.name: cartimage_size
field.label: Choose the size of thumbnail image (uploaded K2)

field.name: show_tax_total
field.label: Show Price with tax in cart, checkout and invoice?
field.description: Enable to show the tax total

field.name: show_billing_address
field.label: Enable billing address fields
field.description: Set yes to enable billing address collection

field.name: allow_guest_checkout
field.label: Allow Guest Checkout?
field.description: Set yes to show guest checkout

field.name: allow_attachment_downloads
field.label: Send attachments upon order completion?
field.description: Set yes to allow sending attachments of the products in the emails

field.name: global_discount
field.label: Set global discount(%)
field.description: Leave empty to disable this. If you set a percentage (without % symbol), discount on the total cart value (without shipping) will be applied

field.name: global_minordervalue
field.label: Set global minimum order value for the cart
field.description: Leave empty to disable this. If you set value here, then order higher than this value alone will be allowed to proceed to checkout

field.name: date_format
field.label: Date Format
field.description: Use the date format. Refer the PHP manual to know the available date formats

field.name: currency
field.label: Currency Symbol
field.description: Enter Currency Symbol (eg. $)

field.name: currency_position
field.label: Currency Symbol Position
field.description: Where to position the currency symbol

field.name: currency_code
field.label: Currency Code
field.description: Enter Currency Code (eg. USD)

field.name: currency_num_decimals
field.label: Decimals
field.description: Enter Decimals

field.name: currency_decimal
field.label: Decimal Separator
field.description: Enter Decimal Separator

field.name: currency_thousands
field.label: Thousands Separator
field.description: Thousands Separator

field.name: emails_defaultemail
field.label: Default From Email ID
field.description: Enter from email id

field.name: emails_defaultname
field.label: Default Sender Name
field.description: Enter default sender name

field.name: admin_email
field.label: Default Admin Email
field.description: Enter Admin email

field.name: shopname
field.label: Shop Name
field.description: Enter the name of the shop

field.name: signature
field.label: Signature
field.description: Enter the signature which will be used in the emails

field.name: show_title
field.label: Show Item Title in Thank you page

field.name: itemid
field.label: Menu Item Id
field.description: Set an item id if you are facing issues with the module assignment

field.name: termsid
field.label: K2 Item Id of Terms and Conditions
field.description: Enter the K2 Item Id which holds the terms and conditions of your store
